Accelerator Field.card_desc: [Barricade] Passing through your Barricade increases the Movement Speed of yourself or your allies by {scale=10|10}% for 5s.

Architectonics.card_desc: [Turret] Increase the damage of your Turrets by 20% and reduce their Cooldown by 3s.

Bowling Ball.card_desc: [Rocket Boots] Gain a {scale=300|300}-Health Shield after activating Rocket Boots that persists for 3s after Rocket Boots ends.

Bunker.card_desc: [Barricade] Increase the Health of Barricade by {scale=250|250}.

Combat Repair.card_desc: [Turret] Heal your Turret for {scale=100|100} every 1s while you are standing near it.

Double-Time.card_desc: [Rocket Boots] Increase your Movement Speed during Rocket Boots by {scale=10|10}%.

Failsafe.card_desc: [Armor] Reset the Cooldown of Rocket Boots after falling to or below {scale=10|10}% Health.

Field Deploy.card_desc: [Turret] Reduce the Deploy Time of your Turret by {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Forged Alloy.card_desc: [Turret] Increase the Health of your Turret by {scale=175|175}.

Fortify.card_desc: [Barricade] Increase the maximum Health of Barricade by 3000 and reduce its Cooldown by 3s.

Foundation.card_desc: [Barricade] Increase the duration of Barricade by {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Fuel Efficiency.card_desc: [Rocket Boots] Increase the duration of Rocket Boots by {scale=0.15|0.15}s.

Healing Station.card_desc: [Turret] Heal for {scale=45|45} every 1s while standing near your Turret.

One Man's Scrap.card_desc: [Armor] Heal for {scale=100|100} over 5s after your Turret is destroyed.

One Man's Treasure.card_desc: [Armor] Reduce your active Cooldowns by {scale=10|10}% after getting an Elimination.

Palisade.card_desc: [Barricade] Reduce the Cooldown of Barricade by {scale=0.4|0.4}s.

Red Streak.card_desc: [Rocket Boots] Reduce the Cooldown of Rocket Boots by {scale=0.8|0.8}s.

Tinkerin.card_desc: [Weapon] Modify your Blunderbuss to fire a single slug that deals 560 damage.

Architektonik.card_desc: [Geschütz] Erhöht den Schaden deiner Geschütze um 20% und reduziert die Abklingzeit um 3s.

Ausfallsicherheit.card_desc: [Rüstung] Fällst du auf oder unter {scale=10|10}% deiner maximalen Gesundheit, wird die Abklingzeit von Raketenstiefel zurückgesetzt.

Bastelei.card_desc: [Waffe] Die Donnerbüchse feuert nur eine einzelne Kugel, die 560 Schaden verursacht.

Beschleunigungsfeld.card_desc: [Barrikade] Gehen du oder deine Verbündeten durch die Barrikade, erhöht sich euer Lauftempo 5s lang um {scale=10|10}%.

Bowlingkugel.card_desc: [Raketenstiefel] Gewährt dir während Raketenstiefel und danach 3s lang einen Schild mit {scale=300|300} LP.

Doppelgesch\u00fctz.card_desc: [Raketenstiefel] Erhöht das Lauftempo während Raketenstiefel um {scale=10|10}%.

Grundlage.card_desc: [Barrikade] Erhöht die Dauer von Barrikade um {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Heilstation.card_desc: [Geschütz] Befindest du dich in der Nähe deines Geschützes, wirst du {scale=45|45} LP pro Sekunde geheilt.

Kampfreparatur.card_desc: [Geschütz] Befindest du dich in der Nähe deines Geschützes, wird es {scale=100|100} LP pro Sekunde geheilt.

Mutig und k\u00fchn.card_desc: [Rüstung] Erhöht deine maximale Gesundheit um {scale=150|150} LP.

Palisade.card_desc: [Barrikade] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Barrikade um {scale=0.4|0.4}s.

Schadenfreude.card_desc: [Rüstung] Eliminierungen reduzieren alle aktiven Abklingzeiten um {scale=10|10}%.

Schrottsammler.card_desc: [Rüstung] Wird dein Geschütz zerstört, wirst du über 5s {scale=100|100} LP geheilt.

Treibstoffeffizienz.card_desc: [Raketenstiefel] Erhöht die Dauer von Raketenstiefel um {scale=0.15|0.15}s.

Verst\u00e4rkung.card_desc: [Barrikade] Barrikade erhält zusätzliche 3000 LP und die Abklingzeit reduziert sich um 3s.

Wutanfall.card_desc: [Raketenstiefel] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Raketenstiefel um {scale=0.8|0.8}s.

Alliage forg\u00e9.card_desc: [Tourelle] Les tourelles ont {scale=175|175} PV de plus.

Architectonique.card_desc: [Tourelle] Les tourelles infligent 20% de dégâts supplémentaires et se rechargent 3s plus vite.

Boule de bowling.card_desc: [Bottes propul.] Les Bottes propulsées génèrent un bouclier de {scale=300|300} PV qui dure 3s.

Bricolage.card_desc: [Arme] Votre tromblon est modifié afin de tirer un projectile unique de 560 dégâts.

Champ acc\u00e9l\u00e9rateur.card_desc: [Barricade] Pour vous et vos alliés, traverser Barricade augmente la vitesse de {scale=10|10}% pendant 5s.

D\u00e9couverte brutale.card_desc: [Armure] Chaque élimination réduit les temps de recharge en cours de {scale=10|10}%.

D\u00e9ploiement.card_desc: [Tourelle] Le temps de déploiement des tourelles diminue de {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

En double.card_desc: [Bottes propul.] Pendant l'effet de Bottes propulsées, votre vitesse augmente de {scale=10|10}% de plus.

Ferrailleur.card_desc: [Armure] Vous récupérez {scale=100|100} PV en 5s quand une tourelle est détruite.

Fortification.card_desc: [Barricade] Barricade a 3000 PV de plus et se recharge 3s plus vite.

Mesure de s\u00e9curit\u00e9.card_desc: [Armure] Passer en dessous de {scale=10|10}% de PV réinitialise le temps de recharge de Bottes propulsées.

Rendement \u00e9nerg\u00e9tique.card_desc: [Bottes propul.] L'effet de Bottes propulsées dure {scale=0.15|0.15}s de plus.

R\u00e9paration de terrain.card_desc: [Tourelle] Près d'une tourelle, vous la soignez de {scale=100|100} PV par seconde.

Station de Soin.card_desc: [Tourelle] Près d'une tourelle, vous récupérez {scale=45|45} PV par seconde.

Tra\u00een\u00e9e rouge.card_desc: [Bottes propul.] Les Bottes propulsées se rechargent {scale=0.8|0.8}s plus vite.

\u4e0d\u4e49\u4e4b\u8d22.card_desc: [护甲] 击败敌方或助攻时所有技能的冷却时间降低{scale=10|10}%

\u4fdd\u9669\u88c5\u7f6e.card_desc: [护甲] 生命值低于最大生命值{scale=10|10}%时，重置火箭靴的冷却时间

\u4fdd\u9f84\u7403.card_desc: [火箭靴] 火箭靴激活时以及结束后的4秒内，你将获得一个具有{scale=300|300}生命值的护盾

\u5145\u80fd.card_desc: [能量掩体] 降低能量掩体的冷却时间{scale=1|1}秒

\u52a0\u901f\u529b\u573a.card_desc: [能量掩体] 当你或盟友穿过能量掩体时，移动速度将提升{scale=10|10}%，持续5秒

\u533b\u7597\u7ad9.card_desc: [防御炮台] 站在炮台附近将使你每秒回复{scale=45|45}点生命值

\u575a\u56fa\u5730\u57fa.card_desc: [能量掩体] 增加能量掩体的持续时间{scale=1|1}秒

\u5efa\u7b51\u5de5\u7a0b\u5e08.card_desc: [能量掩体] 能量掩体的生命值提高4000点，冷却时间缩短3秒

\u6218\u5730\u90e8\u7f72.card_desc: [防御炮台] 减少炮台的部署时间{scale=0.6|0.6}秒

\u6218\u6597\u4fee\u7406.card_desc: [防御炮台] 站在你的炮台附近可以每秒为其回复{scale=100|100}点生命值

\u66b4\u8e81.card_desc: [火箭靴] 减少火箭靴的冷却时间 {scale=1.4|1.4}秒

\u679c\u6562.card_desc: [护甲] 获得{scale=14|14}%的控制抗性和减速抗性

\u67aa\u68b0\u5927\u5e08.card_desc: [武器] 将大口径火枪改装成大威力的单发步枪，每次攻击造成560点伤害

\u70ae\u53f0\u53d1\u660e\u5bb6.card_desc: [防御炮台] 炮台攻击造成的伤害提升20%，冷却时间缩短3秒。

\u7889\u5821.card_desc: [能量掩体] 你的能量掩体的生命值增加{scale=250|250}

\u7cbe\u70bc\u5408\u91d1.card_desc: [防御炮台] 增加你炮台的生命值{scale=175|175}

\u96f6\u4ef6\u56de\u6536.card_desc: [护甲] 当你的炮台被摧毁时，你将在5秒内得到{scale=100|100}点治疗

\u9a6c\u529b\u52a0\u500d.card_desc: [火箭靴] 提高火箭靴的移动速度加成{scale=10|10}%

\u9ad8\u6548\u71c3\u6cb9.card_desc: [火箭靴] 增加火箭靴的持续时间{scale=15|15}%

Accelerator Field.card_desc: [Barricade] If you or your allies walk through Barricade, gain {25}% Movement Speed for 3s

Another Man's Treasure.card_desc: [Turret] Getting an elimination reduces the Cooldown of Turret by {15}%.

Architectonics.card_desc: [Turret][-2s Per Rank] Reduce Cooldown of Turret by {2/4/6/8}s

Bowling Ball.card_desc: [Rocket Boots] Gain a {200} Health shield during Rocket Boots and for 4s after

Brave and Bold.card_desc: [Turret] When near turret you gain {10}% CC reduction.

Combat Repair.card_desc: [Turret] Standing nearby your Turret heals it for {100} Health every second

Double Time.card_desc: [Turret] You may have two Turrets out at once and the Cooldown of Turret is reduced by 10%

Foundation.card_desc: [Barricade] Increase the Duration of Barricade by {2}s

Fuel Efficiency.card_desc: [Rocket Boots] Increase Rocket Boots duration by {30}%

Grudge.card_desc: [Turret] Turret shots reduce healing by {5}% for 2s. May stack twice.

Healing Station.card_desc: [Turret] You regenerate 40 Health per second when you are near your Turret.

Inflame.card_desc: [Weapon] Your weapon shots Burn targets dealing {1.25}% of your target's maximum Health over 3s

Infuse.card_desc: [Barricade] Passing through Barricade heals for {200} over 3s

One Man's Scrap.card_desc: [Barricade] Reduce the cooldown of Barricade by {2}s when one of your turrets is destroyed by an enemy player.

Aleaci\u00f3n forjada.card_desc: [Torreta] La salud de tu Torreta aumenta en {scale=175|175} PS.

Arquitect\u00f3nico.card_desc: [Torreta] El daño de tus Torretas aumenta un 20% y se reduce su recarga en 3s.

Basura de uno.card_desc: [Armadura] Te curas {scale=100|100} PS durante 5s cuando tu Torreta es destruida.

Bola de demolici\u00f3n.card_desc: [Botas cohete] Consigues un escudo de {scale=300|300} PS tras activar Botas cohete que perdura durante 3s después de que acabe Botas cohete.

Campo acelerador.card_desc: [Barricada] Si pasas a través de tu Barricada, tu velocidad de movimiento y la de tus aliados aumentan un {scale=10|10}% durante 5s.

Cimientos.card_desc: [Barricada] La duración de Barricada aumenta en {scale=0.6|0.6}s

Combustible optimizado.card_desc: [Botas cohete] La duración de Botas cohete aumenta en {scale=0.15|0.15}s.

Despliegue de campo.card_desc: [Torreta] Se reduce el tiempo de despliegue de torretas en {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Empalizada.card_desc: [Barricada] Se reduce la recarga de Barricada en {scale=0.4|0.4}s.

Fortalecer.card_desc: [Barricada] La salud básica de Barricada aumenta en 3000 PS se reduce su recarga en 3s.

Infalible.card_desc: [Armadura] Reinicias la recarga de Botas cohete si tu salud baja a un {scale=10|10}% o menos.

Mecha roja.card_desc: [Botas cohete] Se reduce la recarga de Botas cohete en {scale=0.8|0.8}s.

Puesto de curaci\u00f3n.card_desc: [Torreta] Te curas {scale=45|45} PS cada 1s mientras estés cerca de tu Torreta.

Refugio.card_desc: [Barricada] La salud de Barricada aumenta en {scale=250|250}.

Reparador.card_desc: [Arma] Modificas Trabuco para que dispare un solo tiro que inflige 560 PS de daño.

Reparar combate.card_desc: [Torreta] Curas la torreta en {scale=100|100} PS cada 1s mientras estés cerca de ella.

Tesoro de otro.card_desc: [Armadura] Tus recargas activas se reducen un {scale=10|10}% tras conseguir una eliminación.

Tiempo doble.card_desc: [Botas cohete] Tu velocidad de movimiento aumenta un {scale=10|10}% mientras dura Botas cohete.

Valiente y audaz.card_desc: [Armadura] Tu salud máxima aumenta en {scale=150|150} PS.

Alicerce.card_desc: [Barricada] Aumenta a duração da Barricada em {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Arquitet\u00f4nico.card_desc: [Torreta] Aumenta o dano das suas Torretas em 20% e reduz o intervalo delas em 3s.

Bola de Boliche.card_desc: [Botas-foguete] Ganha um escudo com {scale=300|300} de vida ao usar as Botas-foguete, que dura por mais 3s apósm o fim das Botas-foguete.

Bunker.card_desc: [Barricada] Aumenta a vida da Barricada em {scale=250|250}.

Campo de Acelera\u00e7\u00e3o.card_desc: [Barricada] Você e seus aliados ganham {scale=10|10}% de velocidade de movimento por 5s ao atravessar a Barricada.

Combust\u00edvel Eficiente.card_desc: [Botas-Foguete] Aumenta a duração das Botas-Foguete em {scale=0.15|0.15}s.

Esta\u00e7\u00e3o de Cura.card_desc: [Torreta] Você é curado em {scale=45|45} de vida a cada 1s ao ficar perto da sua Torreta.

Forja Refor\u00e7ada.card_desc: [Torreta] Aumenta a vida da Torreta em {scale=175|175}.

Fortificado.card_desc: [Barricada] Aumenta a vida máxima da Barricada em 3000 e reduz seu intervalo em 3s.

Implanta\u00e7\u00e3o.card_desc: [Torreta] Reduz o tempo de instalação da Torreta em {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Incrementado.card_desc: [Arma] Modifica o seu Bacamarte para efetuar um único disparo, que causa 560 de dano.

Infal\u00edvel.card_desc: [Armadura] Zera o intervalo das Botas-foguete ao chegar abaixo de {scale=10|10}% de vida.

Lixo Recicl\u00e1vel.card_desc: [Armadura] Você se cura em {scale=100|100} no decorrer de 5s após sua Torreta ser destruída.

Meu Tesouro.card_desc: [Armadura] Reduz em {scale=10|10}% todos os intervalos ativos ao conseguir uma eliminação.

Pali\u00e7ada.card_desc: [Barricada] Reduz a recarga da Barricada em {scale=0.4|0.4}s.

Rastro Rubro.card_desc: [Botas-Foguete] Reduz o intervalo das Botas-Foguete em {scale=0.8|0.8}s.

Reparo em Combate.card_desc: [Torreta] Sua Toprreta recupera {scale=100|100} de vida a cada 1s enquanto você estiver próximo a ela.

Tempo Dobrado.card_desc: [Botas-foguete] Aumenta em {scale=10|10}% a velocidade das Botas-Foguete.

\u0410\u0440\u0445\u0438\u0442\u0435\u04.card_desc: [Турель] Урон от ваших турелей повышается на 20%, а время перезарядки сокращается на 3 с.

\u0411\u043e\u0443\u043b\u0438\u043d\u04.card_desc: [Реактивные сапоги] После активации Реактивных сапог вы получаете щит прочностью {scale=300|300} ед., который существует еще 3 с. после окончания действия Реактивных сапог.

\u0414\u0432\u043e\u0439\u043d\u043e\u04.card_desc: [Реактивные сапоги] Скорость передвижения в Реактивных сапогах повышается на {scale=10|10}%.

\u0414\u043e\u0432\u043e\u0434\u043a\u04.card_desc: [Оружие] Ваш мушкетон теперь производит по одному выстрелу, наносящему 560 ед. урона.

\u041a\u0440\u0430\u0441\u043d\u0430\u04.card_desc: [Реактивные сапоги] Перезарядка Реактивных сапог сокращается на {scale=0.8|0.8} с.

\u041c\u0435\u0434\u0438\u0446\u0438\u04.card_desc: [Турель] Рядом с Турелью вы исцеляетесь на {scale=45|45} ед. каждую секунду.

\u041c\u0435\u0442\u0430\u043b\u043b\u04.card_desc: [Броня] При уничтожении вашей Турели вы исцеляетесь на {scale=100|100} ед. в течение 5 с.

\u041f\u043e\u043b\u0435\u0432\u043e\u04.card_desc: [Турель] Время установки Турели уменьшается на {scale=0.6|0.6} с.
[Турель] Турель становится на {scale=100|100} ед. прочнее каждую секунду, пока вы стоите рядом с ней.

\u041f\u0440\u0435\u0434\u043e\u0445\u04.card_desc: [Броня] При уровне здоровья {scale=10|10}% и ниже Реактивные сапоги перезаряжаются.

\u0421\u0432\u043e\u0435 \u0441\u043e\u0.card_desc: [Броня] Устранения сокращают текущую перезарядку способностей на {scale=10|10}%.

\u0423\u043a\u0440\u0435\u043f\u043b\u04.card_desc: [Баррикада] Максимальная прочность Баррикады повышается на 3000 ед., а время ее перезарядки сокращается на 3 с.

\u0423\u0441\u043a\u043e\u0440\u044f\u04.card_desc: [Баррикада] Прохождение сквозь вашу Баррикаду повышает скорость передвижения для вас и ваших союзников на {scale=10|10}% на 5 с.

\u0425\u0440\u0430\u0431\u0440\u043e\u04.card_desc: [Броня] Ваше максимальное здоровье повышается на {scale=150|150} ед.

\u042d\u0444\u0444\u0435\u043a\u0442\u04.card_desc: [Реактивные сапоги] Длительность действия Реактивных сапог увеличивается на {scale=0.15|0.15}%.

Architektura.card_desc: [Wieżyczka] Zwiększa obrażenia zadawane przez Wieżyczkę o 20% i skraca jej czas odnowienia o 3 s.

Bunkier.card_desc: [Barykada] Zwiększa odporność twojej barykady o {scale=250|250} pkt.

Cudze \u015bmieci.card_desc: [Pancerz] Zniszczenie twojej wieżyczki przywraca {scale=100|100} PZ w ciągu 5 s.

Czerwona smuga.card_desc: [Rakietowe buty] Skraca czas odnowienia Rakietowych butów o {scale=0.8|0.8} s.

Efektywne paliwo.card_desc: [Rakietowe buty] Wydłuża czas trwania Rakietowych butów o {scale=0.15|0.15} s.

Fortyfikacja.card_desc: [Barykada] Zwiększa maks. odporność Barykady o 3000 pkt. i skraca jej czas odnowienia o 3 s.

Fundamenty.card_desc: [Barykada] Wydłuża czas trwania Barykady o {scale=0.6|0.6} s.

Kula do kr\u0119gli.card_desc: [Rakietowe buty] Zapewnia tarczę o odporności {scale=300|300} pkt. po aktywacji Rakietowych butów, która trwa przez 3 s po zakończeniu Rakietowych butów.

Majsterkowanie.card_desc: [Broń] Modyfikuje Garłacz, aby strzelał pojedynczym pociskiem zadającym 560 obrażeń.

M\u00f3j skarb.card_desc: [Pancerz] Eliminacje skracają aktywne czasy odnowienia o {scale=10|10}%.

Naprawa w boju.card_desc: [Wieżyczka] Przywraca ci {scale=100|100} PZ co 1 s, jak długo stoisz w pobliżu Wieżyczki.

Niezawodno\u015b\u0107.card_desc: [Pancerz] Spadek poniżej {scale=10|10}% maks. PZ powoduje reset czasu odnowienia Rakietowych butów.

Palisada.card_desc: [Barykada] Skraca czas odnowienia Barykady o {scale=0.4|0.4} s.

Podw\u00f3jny czas.card_desc: [Rakietowe buty] Zwiększa szybkość ruchu Rakietowych butów o {scale=10|10}%.

Pole przy\u015bpieszenia.card_desc: [Barykada] Przejście przez twoją Barykadę zwiększa szybkość ruchu twoją i sojuszników o {scale=10|10}% na 5 s.

Pot\u0119ga odwagi.card_desc: [Pancerz] Zwiększa poziom maks. zdrowia o {scale=150|150} PZ.

Rozmieszczenie polowe.card_desc: [Wieżyczka] Rozstawienie Wieżyczki trwa o {scale=0.6|0.6} s krócej.

Stacja lecz\u0105ca.card_desc: [Wieżyczka] Przywraca ci {scale=45|45} PZ co 1 s, jak długo stoisz w pobliżu Wieżyczki.

Bir Adam\u0131n \u00c7\u00f6p\u00fc.card_desc: [Zırh] Taret'in yok edildiğinde 5 saniyede {scale=100|100} Can iyileş.

Bir Adam\u0131n Hazinesi.card_desc: [Zırh] Bir Saf Dışı Bırakma yaptıktan sonra aktif Bekleme Sürelerini %{scale=10|10} azalt.

Bovling Topu.card_desc: [Roket Çizme] Roket Çizme'yi sona erdikten sonra 3sn süren {scale=300|300} Canlık bir Kalkan kazan.

Emniyet.card_desc: [Zırh] %{scale=10|10} Cana veya altına düştüğünde Roket Çizme'nin Bekleme Süresi sıfırla.

H\u0131zland\u0131r\u0131c\u0131 Alan.card_desc: [Barikat] Barikat'tan geçmek hem senin hem de müttefiklerinin Hareket Hızını 5sn boyunca %{scale=10|10} artırır.

\u0130yile\u015fme \u0130stasyonu.card_desc: [Taret] Taret'inin yakınında durduğun her 1 saniyede {scale=45|45} Can iyileş.
